mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.class_name AS "className", a.method_name AS "methodName", a.ann_express AS "annExpress", a.custom_express AS "customExpress", a.ann_describe AS "annDescribe",
a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", createBy.name AS "createBy.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user updateBy ON updateBy.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN sys_user createBy ON createBy.id = a.create_by
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sequence_define a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT FROM sequence_define a WHERE a.class_name = #{className} and a.method_name=#{methodName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sequence_define( id, class_name, method_name, ann_express, custom_express, ann_describe, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{className}, #{methodName}, #{annExpress}, #{customExpress}, #{annDescribe}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
